name: Ito
description:
*GORE WARNING*

Collect all the collectibles and get a different ending 

*CONTROLS* (Controller not supported, sorry)

Movement - A & D

Jump - Space

Change Colour - E

Go through end door - Q

Go through cutscene (Numbers) - Space

Main Menu Music - Derris-Kharlan - Prism Stars - licensed under CC BY-NC-ND 3.0

Journal Music - Geir Tjelta - Brain Artifice - licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 US Remixed by Josh Holmes

Level 1 Music -  Shoji Meguro - The days when my mother was there (8-bit remix by Rodrigo Pereira)

Level 2 Music -  Lyn Inaizumi - Invitation to Freedom (8-bit remix by bran)

Level 3 Music - Shoji Meguro - Life Will Change (8-bit remix by That Guy)

Credits Song - Shoji Meguro - With the Stars and Us

Sound Effects from Pixabay

Game made by:

  • Josh Holmes
  • George Pimlott
  • Ellie Walsh
  • Abbie Murtagh
